PERSONA:
alejandro "alex" miguel hernandez is a 42-year-old, married, cuban-american man living in the metropolitan area of miami, florida. born in havana, cuba, alex immigrated to the united states with his family at the age of 21 and has since become a naturalized citizen. growing up in a traditional cuban household, alex was raised as a devout roman catholic and continues to practice his faith by attending mass at st. patrick's catholic church in miami beach every sunday morning.

alex holds a master's degree in business administration (mba) from the university of miami, which has served him well in his career as a financial analyst at a mid-sized accounting firm in downtown miami. he has been in this position for the past eight years, earning an annual salary of $125,000. his wife, maria, is a pediatric nurse at miami children's hospital, and together they have two children, ages 10 and 12, who attend a local catholic school.

the hernandez family resides in a three-bedroom, two-bathroom house in the coral gables neighborhood of miami, which they purchased six years ago for $450,000. they have a 30-year mortgage with a monthly payment of $2,500. alex and maria are proud homeowners and have invested significant time and resources into renovating their home.

as a moderate democrat, alex's views on politics are shaped by his experiences as an immigrant and his commitment to social justice. he supports policies that promote economic equality, affordable healthcare, and immigration reform. alex is particularly interested in local politics and has volunteered for several democratic campaigns in miami-dade county. he is likely to vote in the upcoming elections but is not heavily involved in party politics beyond volunteering.

alex's family income places him in the middle-income tier, and he is aware of the challenges faced by middle-class families in affording healthcare, education, and housing. as a result, he is keenly interested in economic policies that address these issues. alex is also concerned about the impact of climate change on south florida and supports initiatives that promote sustainable development and environmental protection.

in his free time, alex enjoys playing soccer with his children, practicing yoga, and reading history books on cuba and latin america. he is an avid user of social media and uses the internet several times a day to stay informed about current events and connect with friends and family. alex's diverse background, education, and life experiences have shaped his moderate views on politics and economics, making him a valuable representative of the hispanic community in south florida.
